name: Sudetris
description:
Sudetris is a puzzle game that joins Sudoku and Tetris. Put only different pieces in a 3x3 block, to clean the board and earn points.

Please, test and give me your feedback! ♥

Last Updates:

  • Sometimes when pushed down, the blocks were going sideways too, this bug has been fixed.
  • Now when you complete a 3x3 block, the blocks that were above it fall instantly.

Some of know bugs:

  • When you complete a block, the game don't wait the pieces stop moving to put another piece in the board.
  • Sometimes the pieces stop moving, it can be just the side movement, or everything.
